panels.description: Power consumption of the SLURM jobs over time

targets.expr:
sum(
    (cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules - cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules @ start())
    * on(hostname)
    sum by (hostname, jobid) (rate(slurm_job_total_cpu_seconds_total{jobid=~"$job_id"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) / 3600

sum(
    (cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules - cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules @ start())
    * on(hostname) 
    sum by (hostname, jobid) (slurm_job_allocated_cores{jobid=~"$job_id"})
    ) / 3600
